name: Basic Bot
description: A very simple and basic implementation of a Teams bot app. It demonstrates the ability of bot scenario by echoing userâ€™s input. You can easily customize this app to add business logic.

name: AI Chat Bot
description: A basic Teams bot app using Teams AI library. It showcases a bot app that responds to user questions like an AI assistant. You can use it to build AI-based Teams app.

name: AI Assistant Bot
description: A custom AI assistant bot in Teams using Teams AI library and OpenAI Assistants API. It provides a script to help you easily create assistants. You can change the instructions and settings in the script to customize the assistant.

name: Chat Notification Message
description: A basic implementation of Teams bot app that notifies and informs user with a message displayed in Teams chats. It can be triggered at specific times or by HTTP request. You can easily customize this app to add business logic.

name: Basic Tab
description: A very simple and basic implementation of a Teams tab app. It shows a web page in Teams. You can easily customize this app to add business logic.

name: Chat Command
description: Trigger work with custom chat commands in Teams chats. This app demonstrates how to create a bot that responds to specific commands in chat. You can easily customize this app to add business logic.

name: SPFx
description: Build UI with SharePoint Framework. This app demonstrates how to create a tab app using SharePoint Framework. You can easily customize this app to add business logic.
